author: Simon Difford
description: Strictly speaking, as this cocktail doesn't contain an orange liqueur it is not a Margarita but should properly be termed a "Honey Tequila Sour". We decided Honey Margarita had more of a ring to it. Very tasty it is too.
name: Honey Margarita
recipeIngredient: 20 ml Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
